game_description: Experience the wonders of chemistry in a whole new way with Explayn! This is the ultimate learning tool for children and adults alike. Immerse yourself in a virtual chemistry lab and discover the properties of everyday compounds through interactive simulations and games. A virtual teacher is always here to guide you through ideas and concepts, and you will know everything about chemistry in no time! Learn about the periodic table, conduct experiments, and observe the results of your actions in a safe and engaging environment. With our app, you'll be able to explore the world of chemistry like never before. Some of the exciting features of our app include: - A welcoming virtual teacher that presents ideas and concepts in a friendly way - Fun interactive simulations and games to help you understand and memorize - A virtual chemistry lab where you can manipulate atoms and discover how they form molecules Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to learn about chemistry in a whole new way. Download our VR app today and start your journey of discovery!
review_1: Immersed in learning chemical knowledge and able to demonstrate chemical structures. Looking forward to having more courses in the future with increased interactivity, as that would make it even more enjoyable." It will be more useful if I can talk to AI teacher(like chatGPT).
review_2: A highly innovative experience for grasping the fundamentals of chemistry. It effectively utilizes the strengths of the VR medium (manipulation, expressive avatar teacher, impressive settings, useful 3d objects…)
review_3: Enjoyed the lessons but can’t go past 6.
